s: Purchase/Shipping: Although discounted from regular MSRP, this case of Zico Coconut Water was still about 15-25 percent above local prices of the same product where I reside. Nonetheless, it is one of only a few brands of coconut water that can be shipped to APO addresses.

t: Amazon.com: ZICO Premium Coconut Water, Natural, 11.2 fl oz (Pack of 12) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This brand tastes very fresh to me. I could taste an odd flavor in the Coco Vita brand. Vita adds sugar but Zico's only ingredient is coconut water. When you get coconut water without preservatives it can go rancid easily. So always smell and taste it first and refrigerate as soon as it arrives.

Naturally Pink! Our Coconut Water will have a pink hue due to our premium blend of mature coconuts with the young Nam Hom variety. Nom Hom coconuts are sweeter and turn a natural pink color which is normal and safe.

May 1, 2025 - Zico is a brand of coconut water and other drinks containing coconut water. The drinks are produced by Zico Rising, originally founded as Zico Beverages in 2004. In 2013, the business was acquired by the Coca-Cola Company, which then owned it for the next seven years.
